sqlMap.sql:
u.DEL_FLAG = 0
and u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO in ($RELATE_ORDER_NOS$)
and u.REQ_NAME like '%'||#REQ_NAME#||'%'
and u.REQ_DATE = to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD')
and u.AREA_NAME like '%'||#AREA_NAME#||'%'
and u.CHANN_NAME like '%'||#CHANN_NAME#||'%'
and u.CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO#
and u.CHANN_ID in $CHANNS_CHARG$
and u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO like '%'||#PRMT_COST_REQ_NO#||'%'
and u.STATE = #STATE#
and u.STATE in ($searchSTATE$)
and u.STATE in ($STATES$)
and u.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#
and u.LEDGER_ID = #LEDGER_ID#
and $QXJBCON$

and temp.CORRELATIONID = u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID
u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO in ($RELATE_ORDER_NOS$)
u.REQ_NAME like '%'||#REQ_NAME#||'%'
u.REQ_DATE = to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD')
u.AREA_NAME like '%'||#AREA_NAME#||'%'
u.CHANN_NAME like '%'||#CHANN_NAME#||'%'
u.CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO#
u.CHANN_ID in $CHANNS_CHARG$
u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO like '%'||#PRMT_COST_REQ_NO#||'%'
u.STATE = #STATE#
u.STATE in ($searchSTATE$)
u.STATE in ($STATES$)
u.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#
u.LEDGER_ID = #LEDGER_ID#

select u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.REQ_ID, u.REQ_NAME, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_DATE, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.REQ_REMARK, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.AREA_SEND_COST_RATE, u.AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE, u.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.PRO_SCREEN from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u

select DISTINCT u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.REQ_ID, u.REQ_NAME, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_DATE, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.REQ_REMARK, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.AREA_SEND_COST_RATE, u.AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE, u.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.PRO_SCREEN from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u ,
$QXJBCON$
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ( PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, REQ_ID, REQ_NAME, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, REQ_DATE, CHANN_PERSON_CON, CHANN_TEL, AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_TEL, REQ_REMARK, TOTAL_PRMT_COST, REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, COST_TYPE, TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT, TOTAL_RATE, TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT, TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT, TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT, TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT, AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT, TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT, TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT, AREA_SEND_COST_RATE, AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE, PRMT_PLAN_ID, PRMT_PLAN_NO, PRMT_PLAN_NAME, PRMT_TYPE, BUDGET_ITEM_ID, BUDGET_ITEM_NO, BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, CITY_NAME, CITY_LVL, REQ_MAKE, BUDGET_AMOUNT, RETAIL_AMOUNT, BILL_AMOUNT, AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, ZONE_ID, ZONE_ADDR, DEL_FLAG, BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, PRO_SCREEN )values( #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID#, #PRMT_COST_REQ_NO#, #REQ_ID#, #REQ_NAME#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'), #CHANN_PERSON_CON#, #CHANN_TEL#, #AREA_ID#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_TEL#, #REQ_REMARK#, #TOTAL_PRMT_COST#, #REIT_REQ_AMOUNT#, #COST_TYPE#, #TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_RATE#, #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT#, #AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT#, #AREA_SEND_COST_RATE#, #AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE#, #PRMT_PLAN_ID#, #PRMT_PLAN_NO#, #PRMT_PLAN_NAME#, #PRMT_TYPE#, #BUDGET_ITEM_ID#, #BUDGET_ITEM_NO#, #BUDGET_ITEM_NAME#, #BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE#, #CITY_NAME#, #CITY_LVL#, #REQ_MAKE#, #BUDGET_AMOUNT#, #RETAIL_AMOUNT#, #BILL_AMOUNT#, #AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT#, #AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT#, #AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT#, #WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT#, #WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT#, #WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #ZONE_ID#, #ZONE_ADDR#, #DEL_FLAG#, #BUDGET_QUOTA_ID#, #PRO_SCREEN# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ
PRMT_COST_REQ_NO = #PRMT_COST_REQ_NO# REQ_ID = #REQ_ID# REQ_NAME = #REQ_NAME# CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME# REQ_DATE = to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') CHANN_PERSON_CON = #CHANN_PERSON_CON# CHANN_TEL = #CHANN_TEL# AREA_ID = #AREA_ID# AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_ID = #AREA_MANAGE_ID# AREA_MANAGE_NAME = #AREA_MANAGE_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_TEL = #AREA_MANAGE_TEL# REQ_REMARK = #REQ_REMARK# TOTAL_PRMT_COST = #TOTAL_PRMT_COST# REIT_REQ_AMOUNT = #REIT_REQ_AMOUNT#
COST_TYPE = #COST_TYPE# TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT# TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT# TOTAL_RATE = #TOTAL_RATE# TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT# TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT# TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT# TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT# AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT = #AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT# TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT# TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT = #TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT# AREA_SEND_COST_RATE = #AREA_SEND_COST_RATE# AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE = #AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE# PRMT_PLAN_ID = #PRMT_PLAN_ID# PRMT_PLAN_NO = #PRMT_PLAN_NO# PRMT_PLAN_NAME = #PRMT_PLAN_NAME# PRMT_TYPE = #PRMT_TYPE# BUDGET_ITEM_ID = #BUDGET_ITEM_ID# BUDGET_ITEM_NO = #BUDGET_ITEM_NO# BUDGET_ITEM_NAME = #BUDGET_ITEM_NAME# BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE = #BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE# CITY_NAME = #CITY_NAME# CITY_LVL = #CITY_LVL#
REQ_MAKE = #REQ_MAKE# BUDGET_AMOUNT = #BUDGET_AMOUNT# RETAIL_AMOUNT = #RETAIL_AMOUNT# BILL_AMOUNT = #BILL_AMOUNT# AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT = #AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT# AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT = #AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT# AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT = #AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT# WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT = #WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT# WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT = #WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT# WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT = #WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT# BUDGET_QUOTA_ID = #BUDGET_QUOTA_ID# PRO_SCREEN = #PRO_SCREEN#
where PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.REQ_ID, u.REQ_NAME, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_DATE, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.REQ_REMARK, u.BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_PRMT_COST, u.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_REQ_COST_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_SEND_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_AREA_BUDGET_LEFT_AMOUNT, u.AREA_SEND_COST_RATE, u.AREA_SEND_BUDGET_RATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.PRMT_PLAN_NAME, u.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, u.REQ_MAKE, b.ATT_PATH, u.RETAIL_AMOUNT, u.BILL_AMOUNT, u.CITY_NAME, u.CITY_LVL, u.TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_RATE, u.AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, u.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, u.PRO_SCREEN from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u left join BASE_ATT b on u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = b.FROM_BILL_ID where u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID# and b.DEL_FLAG=0
sqlMap.update: update ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ set STATE = #STATE# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into BASE_ATT( ATT_ID, ATT_PATH, FROM_BILL_ID, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, DEL_FLAG )values( #ATT_ID#, #ATT_PATH#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.select: select sum(NVL(d.dect_price, 0) * NVL(d.storeout_num, 0)) CHUHUO from erp_storeout t, erp_storeout_prd_dtl d where t.storeout_id = d.storeout_id and t.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag = 0 and t.order_chann_id = #CHANN_ID# and TO_CHAR(t.storeout_time, 'Q') = #QUARTER# and to_char(t.storeout_time, 'yyyy') = #YEAR# and exists (select 1 from erp_sale_order_dtl sd where sd.sale_order_dtl_id = d.sale_order_dtl_id and NVL(sd.is_free_flag, 0) = 0)

select sum(NVL(r.BUDGET_AMOUNT,0)) YUPI from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ r where r.state = '审核通过' and r.del_flag = 0 and r.chann_id = #CHANN_ID# and TO_CHAR(r.audit_time, 'Q')= #QUARTER# and to_char(r.audit_time,'yyyy') = #YEAR#
select NVL(t.BUDGET_QUOTA,0) AYUSUAN from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA t where t.del_flag = 0 and t.year = #YEAR# and t.QUARTER = #QUARTER# and t.RELATE_AREA_ID = #RELATE_AREA_ID#
select NVL(t.FREEZE_BUDGET_QUOTA,0) AREAYUPI from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA t where t.del_flag = 0 and t.year = #YEAR# and t.QUARTER = #QUARTER# and t.RELATE_AREA_ID = #RELATE_AREA_ID#

select sum(NVL(t.BUDGET_QUOTA, 0)) WAREYUSUAN from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA t where t.del_flag = 0 and t.year = #YEAR# and t.QUARTER = #QUARTER# and t.RELATE_AREA_ID IN (SELECT a.area_id FROM BASE_AREA a where a.area_id_p = #WAREA_ID#)

select SUM(NVL(t.FREEZE_BUDGET_QUOTA,0)) WAREYUPI from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA t where t.del_flag = 0 and t.year = #YEAR# and t.QUARTER = #QUARTER# and t.RELATE_AREA_ID IN ( SELECT a.area_id FROM BASE_AREA a where a.area_id_p =#WAREA_ID#)

select u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.REQ_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REQ_DATE, u.CITY_NAME, u.CITY_LVL, u.REQ_REMARK, u.REQ_MAKE, u.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, u.PRMT_PLAN_NAME, u.TOTAL_PRMT_COST, u.BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.RETAIL_AMOUNT, u.BILL_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_RATE, u.AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u

select DISTINCT u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.REQ_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REQ_DATE, u.CITY_NAME, u.CITY_LVL, u.REQ_REMARK, u.REQ_MAKE, u.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, u.PRMT_PLAN_NAME, u.TOTAL_PRMT_COST, u.BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.RETAIL_AMOUNT, u.BILL_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_REAL_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_ADVC_AMOUNT, u.TOTAL_RATE, u.AREA_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.AREA_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_BUDGET_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_PRE_AMOUNT, u.WARE_TOTAL_AVALIABLE_AMOUNT from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ u,
$QXJBCON$
